Title: The Vanishing
Actors: Jeff Bridges, Kiefer Sutherland, Nancy Travis, Sandra Bullock
Plot: Barney teaches chemisty, and is planning to abduct a woman. Despite methodical planning and countless trial runs he always manages to mess things up. Then Diane, who is traveling with her boyfriend Jeff, unwittingly makes herself an easy target. The story is mainly from Jeff's viewpoint, as he searches for Diane. Barney watches him.
